attributes.action: Ban corporate entities from publishing or broadcasting advertisements that are political in nature.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in response to the spate of adverts taken out by various companies, notably, Ryanair, which rely on making political points to sell products. Such political activity, by faceless companies who operate without the regulation required by political parties and to which there is no opportunity to respond, damage democracy by influencing consumers by mixing the politics with the product.
